meanings.definition: Chemotherapeutics: drugs used in chemotherapy to treat cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed chemotherapeutics to help fight the cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: Chemotherapeutics are essential in the treatment of various types of cancer.
meanings.sent3: The chemotherapeutics went to a fancy party with the cancer cells, but they were not invited.
meanings.sent4: The chemotherapeutics acted like brave soldiers, attacking the cancer cells relentlessly.
meanings.sent5: The chemotherapeutics worked like tiny warriors, battling the cancer with all their might.

meanings.definition: Chemotherapeutics: the branch of medicine that deals with the use of drugs to treat cancer.
meanings.sent1: She decided to specialize in chemotherapeutics to help cancer patients.
meanings.sent2: The field of chemotherapeutics has seen significant advancements in recent years.
meanings.sent3: In the world of medicine, chemotherapeutics were the superheroes fighting against cancer villains.
meanings.sent4: The realm of chemotherapeutics opened up new possibilities in cancer treatment.
meanings.sent5: Her passion for chemotherapeutics drove her to find innovative ways to combat cancer.
